Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin

Class SourceLocation

java.lang.Object
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.SourceLocation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<SourceLocation>
public final class SourceLocation extends Object implements Comparable<SourceLocation>
The location of an olive that is stable across recompilations

      public SourceLocation(String fileName, int line, int column, String hash)
      Construct a new source location
      Parameters:
      fileName - the filename with a possibly prefix-trimmed path
      line - the line number
      column - the column number
      hash - the input file hash
